EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Lean+Leaders_Backers_2016.Reminder - Denver
EmailTemplate.subject: See You Tomorrow at the Leader’s Guide Workshop!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Leader’s Guide Workshop taking place tomorrow in Denver.
The Leader’s Guide To Adopting Lean Startup at Scale Saturday, July 9th, 2016 Registration @ 9:30am Sessions Start @ 10:00am Lunch will be provided Workshop Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/lean-workshops/backers/denver]]>
Location Pivotal Denver <[[http://pivotal.io/locations/denver]]> 1644 Platte Street Denver, CO 80202 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/1644+Platte+St,+Denver,+CO+80202/@39.7577778,-105.0093211,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x876c78eae5c59869:0x4db4343efa8a9eb6!8m2!3d39.7577737!4d-105.0071324]]>
Questions? Contact us at leadersguide@pivotal.io <[[mailto:leadersguide@pivotal.io]]>
We look forward to seeing you there! The Pivotal Team
